page.title: 04CANNICH AREA: GETTING THERE!
page.content:
The most important method of {communication}in the Cannich area is probably the{telephone.}In an outlying country area such as this it is not a luxury - it is a necessity for most of the inhabitants.
A post bus once a day is the only method of{travel}in and out of the village unless by car or bike. Because of the poor/non-existent{public {transport}it is again considered a necessity - not a luxury - to own a car.
Recently the only petrol station in Cannich closed. Now local residents and those in the outlying areas must ensure that they have sufficient petrol in their tanks for a return journey before leaving the nearby towns.
